column4: Inner loop Man O War Blvd at Tates Creek Rd
column5: The left lane, right lane, and right turn lane are blocked just prior to the intersection.  A semi tanker truck went off the roadway.  Medical incident.

column3: I-64 at 108 MM in Montgomery Co:
column4: The roadway is shutdown in both directions just west of Mt Sterling due to a multi-vehicle collision.  Detours are in place.

column3: I-64 at 108 MM in Montgomery Co:
column4: Eastbound traffic should use Exit 101 to US-60 to KY-686 to US-460.  Westbound traffic should use Exit 110 to US-460 to KY-686 to US-60.

column3: I-64 at 108 MM in Montgomery Co:
column4: Update 7:17 a.m. - The roadway is back open.
